attributes.action: More funding and a better system is needed for our Mental Health
attributes.additional_details: If the system was to change and more funding was put in place, I believe more lives will be saved, people's Mental health will be treated much more fairly and many lives will be changed for the better.
attributes.background: As Mental Health crisis' are becoming more known of and many people getting failed by the system I want the Government to fund and create a better system for people's Mental Health. 6 weeks of therapy is what is offered by the NHS, this is nowhere near enough to even adhere any change.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Improve awareness of mental health conditions and support for sufferers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616860

Give the NHS more funding for mental health support: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617699
